Networking

Class SocketMessageSender

  • java.lang.Object
    • Networking.SocketMessageSender

  • public class SocketMessageSender
extends java.lang.Object
    Created by marcleef on 11/21/15. Handles message sending to various client types (sockets/web sockets).

                           ChannelMap channelMap,
                           TelevisionMap televisionMap,
                           TelevisionWSMap televisionWSMap)
        Constructor for the MessageSender class.
        Parameters:
        mapper - Handles mapping changes.
        channelMap - Mapping of channels to watching televisions.
        televisionMap - Mapping of televisions to associated sockets.
        televisionWSMap - Mapping of televisions to associated web sockets.
